text: Robin Douglas Leach (29 August 1941 â€“ 24 August 2018) was a British entertainment reporter, television presenter and writer. He was best known for hosting the television series Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous from 1984 to 1995. He was known for his signature phrase, "champagne wishes and caviar dreams". Leach died on 24 August 2018 in Las Vegas, Nevada from complications of a stroke at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Robin Leach interview on the Vegas Video Network Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:British television personalities Category:Writers from London
title: Robin Leach
